text: Mba Rida ŋgu bakɨme, ana Zopa ŋgun hara ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba Zopan Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi mbari ki. Mbe kav, Pita Ridan ki kameŋ mbararagiap, mbe mbaram Pita nzuav guma phuni ndi mbarav khaŋ mani ga nzuai, “Ŋko ŋgɨp khaŋ Pita suaŋri, ‘Pita, ndu vhemkora nza han zɨri. Ndu suigsuigɨ thari.’ ”
